dosageInstruction.text:
12.8 mL/hr (5 mcg/kg/min × 68 kg Dosing weight), Intravenous, at 12.8 mL/hr, Continuous, Starting Sat 5/4/13 at 1345
Initiate dopamine drip if patient's systolic BP falls below 70 mmHG. Titrate to keep systolic BP above 90 mmHG. Increase in 2 mcg/kg/min increments. Do no exceed 20 mcg/kg/min. Discontinue dopamine if patient able to maintain systolic BP above 90 mmHG without dopamine infusion.
